content: I screwed up with the ballot close date. It's actually the end of today. Got spoofed by the data difference on the date line. You'd think I'd have learnt that by now
anyway, our ballot reconciliation meeting is before the ballot closes. Can we put it off 24 hours?
so you want to meet tomorrow rather than today. OK for me - how about the others?
For tomorrows call at the usual time go to: https://join.me/paulknapp then 'knock to join' or similar and I'll let you in. You can use your computer or a phone number for audio.
A reminder that our special call is on in 15 mins...
are we sure that WGs have updated their FMM levels prior to publishing R4?
Also, we agreed that there would be a status note added to the IDMP resources. Did we agree who was going to do that?

are we sure that WGs have updated their FMM levels prior to publishing R4?

My workgroups have discussed it and agreed to leave them as is. They all are looking to use R4-R5 as the time they will focus on FMM. Imaging, CBCP, and Security. I think that there was discussion in StructDoc on DocRef/DocMan as well.
Do I need to record this somehow? I expected that no requested change in FMM would not require an action.
